1.title: Why youth leave the church
1.plot: Surveys show that many youth who grow up in the church will leave. Today we examine these surveys and present a powerful solution that is already making a difference.

2.title: How long were the Genesis days?
2.plot: Could the Genesis creation days be millions of years long? Join us as we dive into the language of the biblical text and discover how long God took to create the universe.

3.title: If God created the universe then who created God?
3.plot: Could the Genesis creation days be millions of years long? Join us as we dive into the language of the biblical text and discover how long God took to create the universe.

4.title: Evolutionary creation, round squares and other nonsense
4.plot: Did God use evolution to create the universe? Some people think so. Today we critique an article arguing for 'evolutionary creation'.

5.title: Is Genesis poetry?
5.plot: Before we can hope understand creation we need to be sure of the literary style of Genesis. Is Genesis poetry or does it record actual historical events? We compare the structure of biblical poetry with historical narrative and see which form of literature Genesis matches.

6.title: Archaeology supports the Bible
6.plot: Archaeological discoveries provide powerful support for the accuracy of Scripture. Today we highlight fascinating portions of an interview with a leading archaeologist.

7.title: The Christian response to aliens and UFOs
7.plot: From a Christian perspective, does the Bible allow for the possibility of intelligent alien life?

8.title: Big Bang and the Bible
8.plot: Major scientific problems with the Big Bang are explained along with its incompatibility with Scripture.

9.title: What is the image of God?
9.plot: What is it that humans have that God has and other animals don't?

10.title: Creationists damage Christianity?
10.plot: Are biblical creationists damaging Christianity by ignoring modern science? We have been accused of that, but the truth is exactly opposite. Science supports Scripture.

11.title: Pluto: another young planet
11.plot: Data from the 2015 flyby of Pluto confirmed biblical creationist predictions and posed serious challenges for the 'millions of years', evolutionary story.

12.title: Energizing your spiritual growth
12.plot: Science, creation, Genesis and spiritual growth. How do these things relate to each other?

13.title: Were Adam and Eve real people?
13.plot: Some Christian thinkers have been influenced by evolution to the point where they are questioning the Genesis account of creation including rejecting a historical Adam.

14.title: Who were the Nephilim?
14.plot: Genesis 6 records that the sons of God and the daughters of men produced the Nephilim. Several views are presented on the identity of the Nephilim.

15.title: Radiohalos ruin radiometric dating
15.plot: Radiohalos are the result of nuclear decay. They provide powerful evidence that the earth is young and radiometric dating is highly inaccurate.

16.title: Does God exist?
16.plot: Is there objective evidence that God exists? Can we know God personally? Yes.

17.title: Facts and faith
17.plot: Do faith and facts relate to each other at all? Is there evidence for Christian faith? Yes. A biblical worldview is the best fit for the facts.

18.title: Was Jesus wrong about creation?
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Gain of function mutations - not evidence for evolution
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Five atheist miracles
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: The Bible: Word of God or word of man?
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Why should we trust the Bible?
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Did dinosaurs live after the flood?
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Is Christmas based on pagan traditions?
24.plot: Should Christians celebrate Christmas? Some people suggest that most Christmas holiday traditions came from the pagan world. Is Christmas based on pagan traditions?

1.title: Creation/Evolution: What's It All About? Part 1
1.plot: An introduction to the creation/evolution issue.

2.title: Creation/Evolution: What's It All About?: Part 2
2.plot: A continuation of the discussion about the creation/evolution issue from Part 1.

3.title: Changes in Living Things: Part 1
3.plot: A discussion about how living things change over time, but the type of change scientists observe would never enable the evolution from single cell to humans.

4.title: Changes in Living Things: Part 2
4.plot: Living things do change, but it's not evolution. We continue the discussion from Part 1 about changes in living things.

5.title: What the Bible Says About the Age of the Earth
5.plot: A discussion about the Biblical date for creation and how this affects Christian theology.

6.title: What Science Says About the Age of the Earth
6.plot: A discussion of the scientific evidences for the age of the earth.

7.title: Did God Use Evolution to Create?

8.title: Gap Theory - An Idea with Holes?
8.plot: A discussion about the idea of a time gap between Genesis 1:1 and Genesis 1:2.

9.title: Progressive Creation, Preposterous Compromise
9.plot: A discussion of the pitfalls of 'Progressive Creation'.

10.title: Noah's Ark - Real or Ridiculous?
10.plot: The feasibility of Noah's Ark is discussed.

11.title: Dinosaurs and the Bible
11.plot: A discussion about where dinosaurs fit into Biblical history.

12.title: Aliens and UFOs - What Are They Really?
12.plot: Gary Bates is interviewed to discuss contents from his book "Alien Intrusion - UFOs and the Evolution Connection"

13.title: The Tower of Babel and the Origin of 'races'
13.plot: A discussion about how different skin shades could result from a single people group which dispersed from Babel.

14.title: Radiometric Dating - An Evolutionist's Best Friend?
14.plot: A discussion about the assumptions that cause inaccuracies in radiometric dating.

15.title: Noah's Flood: Key to Understanding the Age of the Earth: Part 1
15.plot: A discussion about the role that Noah's Flood has of determining the age of the earth.

16.title: Noah's Flood: Key to Understanding the Age of the Earth: Part 2
16.plot: A continuation of the discussion from Part 1.

17.title: 15 Reasons to Take Genesis as History
17.plot: Fifteen reasons are discussed indicating the Genesis records actual historical events.

18.title: Astronomy - The Heavens Declare the Glory of God
18.plot: A discussion about astronomy and Biblical creation.

19.title: Defending the Christian Faith
19.plot: Special guest Joe Boot joins Richard and Calvin as they discuss evidences for the truth of the Bible and Christianity.

20.title: Hot Topics - Controversies in the Culture
20.plot: A discussion about how Christians should view controversial topics biblically.

21.title: Cornerstones of Evolution Refuted
21.plot: Key evidences for evolution are refuted.

22.title: Refuting Arguments Against Noah's Flood
22.plot: Geologist Dr Emil Silvestru joins hosts Richard Fangrad and Calvin Smith to discuss and refute geological arguments against Noah's Flood.

23.title: Effective Evangelism in an Evolutionized World: Part 1
23.plot: Part 1 of 2 discussing evangelism strategies in a world that doesn't believe the Bible.

24.title: Effective Evangelism in an Evolutionized World: Part 21
24.plot: Pastor and evangelist Cory McKenna joins Richard and Calvin as they discuss evangelism.

1.title: The Roman Road Begins in Genesis
1.plot: The Gospel is often summarized by key verses in Romans. This is referred to as the 'Roman Road' to salvation. Key concepts from Genesis form the foundation for this Roman Road.

2.title: Why Natural Selection Supports Biblical Creation
2.plot: Natural selection is erroneously used as evidence for the evolution of people from a single cell. Actually, new discoveries involving natural selection support Biblical creation and powerfully refute evolution.

3.title: Genetic Mutation - Magnificent Modifier or Mega Meltdown?
3.plot: Special guest, former atheistic evolutionist Dr John Sanford provides remarkable insights into his field of science (genetics) that powerfully supports a recent creation of humans and no evolution.

4.title: When Did God Create?
4.plot: Did God create millions of years ago, or only thousands? Can we know for sure? How accurately can a date be determined? Watch this week's episode for a discussion on these topics.

5.title: Scientific Evidences for a Recent Creation
5.plot: Scientific evidences for a recent creation are summarized in this fast-paced episode.

6.title: God's Amazing Design
6.plot: How do we recognize when something is designed? Richard and Calvin explore some of the amazing design all around us; the evidence for an intelligent Designer.

7.title: Continental Drift and the Bible
7.plot: Have the continents moved apart? If so, when? Could this have something to do with Noah's Flood? These and many more questions are discussed on this week's episode.

8.title: The Relationship Between Science and Faith
8.plot: What is the nature of the relationship between faith and science? Can the apparent separation between science and faith ever be eliminated? Join the discussion.

9.title: Dinosaurs and Humans - Did They Live Together?
9.plot: What fossil evidence supports dinosaurs and humans living at the same time? Do scientists ever find dinosaurs buried with animals that were not supposed to have evolved yet? Tune in to find out.

10.title: Aliens and UFOs - What Are They Really?
10.plot: How should Christians react to stories of strange lights in the sky and terrifying night time abductions?

11.title: Where Do the Fossils Fit?
11.plot: How old are fossils? When was the fossil record produced? Could fossils have existed when God called His creation "very good"? Tune for the answers.

12.title: Marvellous Molecular Machines
12.plot: Through eye-popping computer animation, based on recent scientific discoveries, this week's episode explores amazing biological machines at work in our bodies.

13.title: Who Is the God of Genesis?
13.plot: Are Christian deluding themselves? How do we know there is a God, and specifically the God revealed in the Bible?

14.title: Evolutionary Creation
14.plot: Did God use evolution to create? Could Jesus and Paul be wrong about creation? Tune is as we discuss statements by leading theistic evolutionists.

15.title: Creative Genesis Interpretations
15.plot: Were the events in Genesis actually historical? Where can we look for clues on how to interpret Genesis?

16.title: Astronomy, the Big Bang and Creation
16.plot: Is the big bang the only possible explanation for what we see in the heavens? How observations in astronomy fit with the Bible - this week on Creation Magazine LIVE.

17.title: Why Christianity Is True
17.plot: Is it reasonable to be a Christian? What is the evidence that the Bible is really the 'word of God'?

18.title: A Mountain of Evidence?
18.plot: Is there a mountain of evidence for evolution? Key evolution evidences refuted.

19.title: Same Old Song and Dance
19.plot: Why do evolutionary hoaxes and deceptions continue to be taught? Some of the worst examples of this are explored.

20.title: How Did Bad Things Come About?
20.plot: Why is there so much death in the world? If Genesis is not historical answering this question is difficult.

21.title: Effective Evangelism in an Evolutionized World
21.plot: Jesus and Paul linked important doctrines to a real, historical Genesis. This week we explore tips on telling others the truth about how to be saved, considering that many think the Bible cannot be trusted.

22.title: Transitional Fossils? Where?
22.plot: The 'missing links'-hailed as proof for evolution-are examined and debunked.

23.title: Ape-men and Humans 99% Similar?
23.plot: Is ape and human DNA really 99% similar? Many people believe humans evolved from and apelike ancestor, but science disagrees: we were created.

24.title: The Ice Age and the Bible
24.plot: What is the evidence for an Ice Age? Where does it fit into Biblical history? What caused it?

1.title: What Would We Know About Creation If We Only Had the New Testament?
1.plot: Many Christians feel that Genesis is a side issue and that modern Christians should just focus on New Testament teachings. What would we know about origins if we only studied the New Testament?

2.title: Fossils: Evidence for Biblical Creation
2.plot: Fossils provide remarkable support for the Bible's account of history, beginning with creation and including a global flood. This week we focus on some fossils that are very difficult to fit into the 'millions of years' timescale, but fit wonderfully with the Bible.

3.title: How Smart Was Ancient Man?
3.plot: Evolutionary storytelling presents the history of mankind as emerging from largely dull and brutish ancestors into more sophisticated and increasingly intelligent modern people. The Bible depicts humans as highly capable right from the beginning of creation, and the evidence we find supports that conclusion.

4.title: CMI's Role in the Body of Christ.
4.plot: Christians are part of the body of Christ. Various Christian groups pool resources to accomplish the work God has called them to. What role does CMI play in the body of Christ and of what value is it?

5.title: Why Does Evidence Always Point to Evolution?
5.plot: The book of Romans says that the evidence of God's creation is 'clearly seen' by all and that men are 'without excuse' for their disbelief (Romans 1:20). Why then does it seem that public education and media almost always present evidence as pointing to an evolutionary conclusion?

6.title: Grand Canyon: Evidence for Noah's Flood
6.plot: Join us as we explore Grand Canyon via river raft. The geology of Grand Canyon testifies to the massive catastrophe that caused its formation.

7.title: Countering Creation Skeptics
7.plot: Many skeptics accuse creationists of pushing 'bad science' and religious ideas. This week we examine evolution according to the evolutionists own criteria.

8.title: Can You Be a Christian and Believe in Evolution?
8.plot: Some Christians believe in evolution. Does this mean they are not Christians? Scientists and theologians are interviewed to answer this question.

9.title: Creation and Public Education
9.plot: Do Creationists want biblical creation taught in public schools? The answer may shock you.

10.title: More Evidences for a Recent Creation
10.plot: Continuing from previous episodes in past seasons, this week we look at a collection of Bible-supporting scientific evidences for a recent creation from a wide variety of fields.

11.title: What Did the Church Fathers Believe About Genesis?
11.plot: Some Old Earth Creationists (such as Dr Hugh Ross) have taught that old earth teaching was common among the church fathers, and that a young earth interpretation is recent invention. This week we set the record straight by looking at what the church fathers actually said about how God created.

12.title: Tracing the Nations Back to Babel
12.plot: This week we explore extra-Biblical historical records that testify to the ancient nations beginning as family units from Noah's descendants. This powerfully supports the Bible's history.

13.title: The Atheists' Creation Story
13.plot: All thinking people have to answer the question of origins. Today we explore what atheists must believe about where they came from?

14.title: Life from Non-life?
14.plot: Has the law of biogenesis (life begets life) been broken? Evolution says yes. However, when established scientific laws are broken we recognize that as miraculous. The origin of life requires a miracle.

15.title: Do We All Come from Two People?
15.plot: Many scientists say that the evidence from genetics incontrovertibly shows humans did not originate from a single pair. This week we look at specific arguments by bible skeptics and show how wrong they are.

16.title: What Is the Most Cutting-edge Fact for Creation?
16.plot: Are there any facts that are so powerful that anyone who hears them would believe creation? Powerful evidences for Biblical creation this week on Creation Magazine LIVE.

17.title: No Two Ways About It - Operational vs Historical Science
17.plot: One of the biggest stumbling blocks to understanding the debate about origins is not knowing the difference between operational and historical science.

18.title: Why Is Origins Important?
18.plot: Why focus on the origins debate if it is not a salvation issue? How does a believer's view about Genesis and creation affect their view of salvation?

19.title: Pop Culture and Evolution
19.plot: This week Richard and Calvin discuss how pop culture influences the debate about origins.

20.title: World Winding Down - Interview with Carl Wieland
20.plot: Everything (ultimately) progresses toward disorder. The second law of thermodynamics is often misused by both evolutionists and creationists. The clarity that Dr Wieland provides about this most fundamental law provides powerful support for the Christianity.

21.title: One Human Family - Interview with Carl Wieland
21.plot: A fascinating look at human culture through the eyes of one of the fathers of the modern creation movement. Author, speaker and founder of Creation magazine Dr Carl Wieland is our guest.

22.title: Physics and Creation - Interview with Jim Mason
22.plot: Can a physicist really accept a recent creation? Find out in this revealing interview with physicist Dr Jim Mason.

23.title: Neo-catastrophism vs Uniformitarianism
23.plot: Uniformitarianism, long shown by creationists to be an inadequate way to explain observable strata worldwide, was once the foundational 'doctrine' of geology. This has now changed to 'Neo-catastrophism'. Why, and does this theory fare any better?

24.title: Homology - Do Common Structures Imply Common Ancestor?
24.plot: Similarity in living things is hailed as knock-down evidence for evolution. Find out why it actually powerfully supports Biblical creation.

1.title: Biomimetics - Engineers Copying the Creator
1.plot: God is the ultimate engineer. Recent scientific discoveries show amazing design in the living world, far exceeding our current technology. Engineers are attempting to copy this design as they invent new technology often without acknowledging the original Designer.

2.title: Transhumanism - Using Technology to Propel Human Evolution
2.plot: Transhumanists believe that humanity will evolve to the next level within our lifetime by utilizing modern technology. Explore the Darwinian roots of this growing worldwide movement and see how it exposes man's sinful desire to 'become God'.

3.title: Is the Evidence for Deep Time Really Rock Solid?
3.plot: For many people the age of the earth is a settled issue. Even many creationists believe the earth is millions of years old. But the original, main geological arguments used to solidify the concept of 'deep time' in the 1800's have been abandoned today. It is time to re-examine the 'millions of years'.

4.title: What the Reformers Believed About Genesis
4.plot: Contrary to what many popular Old Earth Creationists like Dr Hugh Ross have said, the Reformers held to a 'Young Earth' position. Examine the documented quotes from these esteemed theologians that clearly put to rest any doubt as to their biblical creationist position.

5.title: Living Fossils: Fossils That Debunk Evolution
5.plot: 'Living Fossils' are characterized as creatures found in the fossil record (supposedly millions of years old) that are seemingly identical to creatures living today. This is a thorny issue for evolutionists since Darwin proposed his evolutionary hypothesis. The evidence of 'massive change over time' is dwindling rapidly. Meanwhile the evidence supporting creation is growing rapidly.

6.title: The Holocaust Before the Holocaust
6.plot: The Nazi Holocaust is seen by many as a gruesome but aberrant event in history. But 60 years earlier the Darwinian idea that some humans are not fully human resulted in horrifying brutality perpetrated upon the Herero people in south-west Africa. The Holocaust of WWII serves as reminder of the fruit of evolutionary thinking that began long before and continues today.

7.title: The Key to Understanding the Creation/Evolution Debate
7.plot: If the creation/evolution debate was simply about empirical science, the debate would have been over with years ago. So, why is it that the debate continues? Why can't people from opposing views understand the other person's position? Learn the key concept that will unlock your understanding of the origins debate.

8.title: How Theistic Evolution Affects Christian Theology
8.plot: Some evolution-believing Christians have declared that the theory of evolution is compatible with the Christian faith. Can evolution be blended with the Bible? This week we take a close look at the damage this kind of thinking has inflicted on the church, Christian theology and the average person's perception of God.

9.title: The Key to Understanding the Age of the Earth Debate
9.plot: Biological evolution is a far less controversial topic among Christians than the age of the earth. But one event recorded in the Bible is the key to understanding the majority of the issues people have with the idea of 'millions of years'.

10.title: Amazing Design in Animals
10.plot: Even evolutionist Richard Dawkins agrees "We have seen that living things are too improbable and too beautifully 'designed' to have come into existence by chance." However, the truth is 'design' indicates a 'designer', and natural selection is inadequate to explain the amazing creatures featured on today's show. Watch Richard and Calvin explain the amazing complexity of animals like the quick drawing Pistol shrimp, terrible termites and the tiny seahorse.

11.title: Will the Real Creationists Please Stand Up?
11.plot: There are a variety of views on creation that could be called the 'creationist' view. Whether Christians hold to the Gap Theory, Day Age Theory, Framework Hypothesis or Biblical (Young Earth) Creation, they all believe their interpretation is correct. Which one is correct? Find out who the real creationists are as we sort through the issues on today's show.

12.title: The Trojan Horse of 'deep Time'
12.plot: In the famous tale from Homer's "Odyssey" the fortress of Troy was defeated by the Greek army leaving a large wooden horse (secretly filled with soldiers) behind as a supposed gift. The Trojans willingly took it into their city leading to their defeat. Today we retrace how 'deep time' infiltrated the church in a similar way, and led to the lack of biblical authority we see today.

13.title: What Did the Son of God Believe About Creation?
13.plot: Continuing on from previous episodes ("What the church fathers believed about Genesis" and, "What the Reformers believed about Genesis") we now examine the words of the Son of God in His written revelation to us. What did Jesus believe about Genesis?

14.title: Practical evangelism with evangelist Henry De Roos
14.plot: Dynamic street evangelist Henry De Roos gives practical advice on how to use evidence about God's creation to share the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

15.title: Famous Creation Scientists - From Newton to Sarfati
15.plot: Is it true that no 'real' scientist can be a creationist? Many of the founding fathers of modern science were Bible-believing Christians, as were many of the lesser known scientists who expanded our scientific knowledge. Today we examine the lives of brilliant men of science who were also men of God.

16.title: Fossil Mix Ups - When Fossils Are Found Where They Shouldn't Be
16.plot: Whoops. What happens when scientists find fossils in the 'wrong' evolutionary sequence? This week, learn how the neat, ordered sequence of fossils required by evolution theory has serious problems, but fits wonderfully with the Bible. The facts reveal that the evolutionary time-line is wrong.

17.title: It's a Great Time to Be a Christian!
17.plot: The world seems to think Christianity is for simple, uneducated people who are out of touch with science. This week we share a little of the growing, positive evidence for the truth of creation and Christianity. It really is a great time to be a Christian.

18.title: Refuting 'bad Design' Arguments
18.plot: Creationists often point to the incredible evidence of design in nature as proof of God's existence. But what about things that don't look well designed or appear to have been designed to do 'bad things'? Evidence of 'design' is not enough. Find out why the true history in the Bible is essential to understand the world we live in.

19.title: Speciation: Yes, Evolution: No
19.plot: Rapid speciation has always been a cornerstone of Young Earth Creationist belief. If all of the animals we see today are descended from the limited amount of animals on Noah's Ark then rapid speciation must have occurred. See the stunning evidence of this very thing and why it is so challenging to evolutionists and 'Old Earth' creationists alike.

20.title: Speciation and Biblical Kinds - What's the Connection?
20.plot: God's Word says that animals were created to reproduce 'after their kind' (not to evolve into other kinds over millions of years). But what is a 'kind'? If new species are being produced, does that support creation or evolution? Are the 'kinds' mentioned in Genesis the same as today's species?

21.title: The Koran vs Genesis
21.plot: Many people say the Muslim god and the God of the Bible are the same. If that's true then the Koran and the Bible should agree with one another, but they don't. Find out why a belief that the god of the Koran could never be reconciled with the God that wrote Genesis.

22.title: The Creation Model - Big Picture of History
22.plot: The theory of evolution is described in much detail in most classrooms today. Names, dates, classifications, etc., all seem to point to a very 'scientific' history of the world. But what about Creation? Does it have a cohesive historical narrative that can be backed up scientifically? Absolutely. Look at the 'big picture' of the Bible's history on this week's show.

23.title: Evolution and Education- How to Survive in a Secular System
23.plot: State run school systems teach evolution as fact. And most children from Christian homes go to state schools. What can a student do to defend their faith in such a hostile environment? How can parents prepare their children? This week we discuss practical tips and real life examples.

24.title: Was Noah's Flood Global?
24.plot: Does it matter whether it was global or local? What does the scripture actually say? If it was a global flood, where's the evidence for it? These and other questions are answered.

1.title: How Should the Bible Be Interpreted?
1.plot: Some say that the Bible doesn't say how it should be interpreted. So can everyone determine how to interpret it for themselves? Is there a universal way to interpret the Bible? If there is, what is it?

2.title: Was Darwin a Plagiarist?
2.plot: Charles Darwin is often presented as a brilliant, iconic figure who single-handedly changed the scientific landscape. His picture is on the British ten pound note, and he is looked up to by many as a great scientist. But research over the last 100 years reveals a different story.

3.title: Humans with Tails?
3.plot: A persistent evolutionary argument is the concept of vestigial (left over) organs in humans, supposedly inherited from man's evolutionary ancestors. One popular idea is that humans are sometimes born with tails. Learn how to separate fact from fiction.

4.title: Death Before Sin? What Type of Death?
4.plot: Contrary to scripture, old earth creationists and theistic evolutionists often claim that there were animals dying long before Adam and Eve. But did creatures just live happy peaceful lives and then quietly die? What does the fossil record reveal?

5.title: How Old Is the Earth?
5.plot: How old is the earth? Six to ten thousand years old? Older? How precisely can a creation date be calculated? Why do most scientists believe the earth is old? This week Richard and Calvin explore one of the most controversial issues in the church, and answer these and many more questions about when God created.

6.title: Evidence for Noah's Flood
6.plot: The Bible describes a global flood about 1600 years after creation. The most devastating catastrophe ever recorded would surely leave evidence, wouldn't it? So what are consequences of Noah's Flood?

7.title: Atheism Needs Evolution
7.plot: Some people think that evolution has nothing to do with an individual's philosophical outlook. But atheism can't exist evolution. The question of origins has only two possible answers, and for atheists there is only one choice.

8.title: When Exactly Were Bad Things Created?
8.plot: A very common question is a version of: "If God is so loving, why are there bad things in the world?" The implication is that if God created the world in the state it is in, He can't be 'very good' Himself. The Bible clearly says that God created everything in 6 days. So when exactly were bad things created?

9.title: What Will That Restoration Be Like According to Genesis?
9.plot: Many Christians wonder about what our eternal existence will 'look like'. Bible believing Christians know that God is going to create a New Heavens and a New Earth. Hints about what it will be like are found in Genesis.

10.title: Radiometric Back Flips-How Solid Are Those Dates?
10.plot: A popular myth is that radioactive dating methods confirm the geologic time-scale and the concept of human evolution. The methods appear so impressive that many Christians accept them as evidence that the earth is very old. But how solid are those dates?

11.title: Logic, Reason and Christianity
11.plot: Despite what some people believe, logic and reason are essential to Christianity. Without them it's impossible to deduce anything from the true propositions of the 66 books of Scripture, which is the final authority for a Christian.

12.title: The Probability of Evolution
12.plot: In a debate on June 30, 1860 Thomas Huxley stated that monkeys could, given enough time, produce a Psalm purely by chance. Similarly, molecular movement, given enough time could produce man without a Creator. See why probability arguments like this fail to support evolution.

13.title: Epigenetics: What Is It and How Does It Confirm Creation?
13.plot: Most people know about the DNA code as the 'language of life'. Now scientists have discovered the epigenetic code. DNA code is governed by this code, a code so significant that one science writer said that genes are 'little more than puppets'. What is it and how does it confirm creation?

14.title: Did God Really Say?
14.plot: Should Genesis be read as a historical narrative? Does it matters if it is not? Is Genesis written only so that the ancient Hebrews could understand it, but it actually supports today's cosmological, geological and biological theories? The bottom line is: "What did God really say?"

15.title: Hobbit Wars: The Evolution of an Ape Man
15.plot: How are evolutionary stories concocted? Are facts given priority over theory? Watch the evolution of the discovery of the so-called 'Hobbit' fossil (missing links) and the stories that were made up to attempt to fit the facts into the evolutionary history.

16.title: Creation and Marriage
16.plot: Marriage is one of the most precious relationships that God has ordained. But many people seem confused about what marriage is. Does the Bible teach polygamy? Is 'same sex' marriage a Godly covenant? Walk through the Bible starting from Genesis to see God's clear standards for marriage.

17.title: Genesis: A Case Study for Biblical Authority
17.plot: Christians will agree that God's Word supersedes man's word. However, regarding the creation account, there is a much greater tendency to give authority to extra-biblical ideas. Genesis chapters 1-11 is a case study for biblical authority.

18.title: Jesus Is God - A Biblical Defense of the Trinity
18.plot: Do Christians worship one God, or three? How does God describe Himself in His Word?

19.title: Uniformitarianism and the Age of the Earth
19.plot: Uniformitarianism is a concept that only processes observed today (slow sedimentation, slow erosion) should be used to explain geology. Learn why it is wrong scientifically, doesn't fit with the Bible, and how it has lead geology astray for the past 200 years.

20.title: Handling the Critics
20.plot: Christians are being persecuted more and more throughout the Western world as secular humanism continues to grow. But nowhere is criticism and ridicule poured out more than upon biblical creationists, those that take the Bible as plainly written. Learn how to handle the critics attacking creation.

21.title: Tree Ring Dating
21.plot: Trees are among the oldest living things on the planet. Some say longer than biblical Creation would allow. Dendrochronology is the science dealing with the study of the rings of trees in determining the dates and chronological order of past events. Learn why it is a help rather than a hindrance to the biblical chronology.

22.title: More Amazing Design in Animals
22.plot: The Bible says God is revealed in His creation. Romans chapter 1 verse 20 demonstrates that everyone can know God exists because of what He made so that they are 'without excuse'. Flying squid, tree climbing crocodiles, woodpeckers, fireflies and decoy spiders are all evidence of the Creator God of the Bible.

23.title: Everyone Lives by Faith
23.plot: There are different kinds of faith. This show explains why everyone lives by faith and summarizes and compares different kinds of faith. In particular it looks at the role that faith plays in the origins debate, for both evolutionists and creationists.

24.title: Refuting abortion arguments
24.plot: Abortion has been one of the most important ethical issues in Western society for the last four decades. Many people, sadly including many Christians, think abortion is a difficult issue to understand and resolve. Watch the show to examine scripture to gain clarity in this controversial topic.

1.title: The Irrational Faith of Evolution
1.plot: The creation/evolution debate is often described as 'science VS faith'. However, everyone lives by faith. This week we explore several types of faith and shows how belief in evolution fits the category of irrational faith.

2.title: Making Sense of 'ape-man' Claims.
2.plot: Most have seen the supposed 'ape-to-man' progression on a T-shirt, poster or elsewhere pushing the idea that humans evolved from 'ape-men' in the past. What are these supposed 'proto-human' fossils that scientist have found and how would Bible-believing creationists explain them?

3.title: The Biblical Basis for Modern Science.
3.plot: How did science begin? What sort of a worldview provides a basis for understanding nature? Learn why modern science was actually birthed and flourished under a Christian worldview.

4.title: Using the Bible to Defend the Bible.
4.plot: A common objection is: "Believing the Bible is true because it says so is circular reasoning." Yet all philosophical systems start with axioms which are non-provable. Learn why starting with the Bible is the best way to defend it.

5.title: Are Genesis 1 and 2 Contradictory?
5.plot: Genesis chapters 1 and 2 certainly are different, but they are not contradictory. Learn how the differences actually serve to provide the most details of a single creation account.

6.title: What About the Stone Age?
6.plot: Many historians describe primitive 'Stone age' men living long before the first man, Adam, existed. This reinforces a time-line that contradicts the Bible. Learn how the Bible's time-line provides the best framework for understanding the 'stone age'.

7.title: Flood Legends
7.plot: The Bible is not the only record of an account of a global flood. Many cultures around the world have stories similar to the biblical account. This reinforces that it was a real event.

8.title: Does the Bible Condone Slavery, Abuse or Mass Murder?
8.plot: According to many Bible skeptic internet warriors the Bible is an evil book that condones slavery and rape, etc. How do Christians answer these accusations when skeptics quote passages from the Bible itself as supposed proof?

9.title: Genesis: The Seedbed of All Christian Doctrine
9.plot: Is Genesis really important to today's Christian? Without Genesis could we still have a good understanding of Christianity's main teachings? Find out how and why Genesis relates to Christian doctrines.

10.title: The 'ape to Man' Evolutionary Image Is a Fraud.
10.plot: The 'ape to man' image. Everyone has seen it on a TV show, a tee-shirt, coffee mugs, kids shows, you name it. Find out why that most iconic evolutionary image is a fraud based on known inaccuracies and false information.

11.title: The Flat Earth Myth and the Bible.
11.plot: Does the Bible teach that the Earth is flat? Did pre-scientific people really think that the Earth was flat? Watch Richard and Calvin debunk the Bible skeptics who misuse various Bible passages to suggest that the Bible says that the Earth is flat.

12.title: Fossils: Evidence Something Happened Quickly, Not Slowly.
12.plot: Many people were taught that fossils are evidence of things happening slowly over millions of years. But they're not. This week, find out why standard evolutionary explanations for fossil formation don't work.

13.title: Is Evolution Pseudoscience?
13.plot: We are often told creation is religion and evolution is science. But is evolution really science? On today's broadcast, see how the theory of evolution exhibits most of the characteristic fallacies of pseudoscientific theories.

14.title: What About Mammoths?
14.plot: What are mammoths? When did they live? How did they live? Why did they become extinct and can they be cloned? Find out about these creatures and how they relate to the creation/evolution debate this week on Creation Magazine LIVE.

15.title: Origins - Who Is Being Divisive?
15.plot: Jesus prayed that believers, "would be brought into complete unity, or become perfectly one". Jesus prioritized unity. Learn how this relates to Christians who hold different views of creation.

16.title: What About the Garden of Eden?
16.plot: Where was the Garden of Eden? What was it like? What did it contain? The Bible does not give us all of the answers, but it does give us lot of them, and many can be logically deduced from scripture.

17.title: Evolutionists Say the Oddest Things
17.plot: Evolutionists sometimes say the oddest things. Watch to hear interesting, surprising and sometimes shocking quotes and admissions from leading evolutionary scientists who are daring enough to expose massive problems with various aspects of evolution.

18.title: How Does Genetics Point to Design?
18.plot: Gregor Mendel (father of genetics) and Charles Darwin (father of modern evolution) disagreed. Darwin claimed creatures could change into unlimited other creatures. Mendel's discoveries suggest otherwise. See which idea science supports.

19.title: Does the Bible Contain Scientific Errors?
19.plot: Does the Bible say pi equals 3? Does it mention unicorns as real animals? Does it say that insects have 4 legs? Skeptics answer yes, but are wrong, again.

20.title: Can Certain Geological Structures Be Explained by a Global Flood?
20.plot: Can certain geologic features like tillites, chalk beds and paleosols be explained by a global flood? Skeptics say no. Find out how the Biblical flood makes more sense of the very features used to try and disprove it.

21.title: Cloning and Stem Cell Research - Right or Wrong?
21.plot: Cloning and stem cell research technologies have been around for a while now, and they often generate controversy. Discover the Biblical response that Christians should be taking regarding these things.

22.title: How Can a Good God Allow Evil in the World?
22.plot: Explaining the origin of death and suffering is vitally important in defending Christianity, since many people use the existence of 'evil' as an excuse not to believe in God. Learn why a literal-historical Genesis account is vital in answering.

23.title: The Lost Squadron
23.plot: On July 15, 1942, six P-38 Lightning fighters and two B-17 bombers left a secret US Army air base headed for a British airfield to fight Hitler. They never made it. Find out how this story relates to the Ice Age and the authenticity of scripture.

24.title: Geniuses in the Genealogies
24.plot: If evolution were true, the further back into history we look, evidence should show a gradual decline in man's intelligence. Science shows otherwise. Man, created in God's image, has always been intelligent.

imdb.title: Creation Magazine LIVE!
plot: The Creation Magazine LIVE TV program is a ministry of Creation Ministries International featuring cutting-edge science that supports the Bible delivered in a non-technical, visually-rich, discussion-based format.
